opis: Nevjerojatna prilika Prodajem kucu u srcu Tvrdje za dobru investiciju spremna za adoptaciju (punu renovaciju) Mozete iskoristiti poticaj. Moze i zamjena sa nadoplatom i otvoren za druge combinacije.Trazim 75000 evro ili priblizna ponuda. Ako imate novca i vremena za dobru buducnost. Prodajem zbog toga sto zivim u inostranstvu i nevracam se u Hrvatsku.Ima i dozvolu za rad i druge papire. Ukoliko vas interesira pozovite na broj 098843997   Ili investitora partnera. Ukoliko imate neku kombinaciju ili zamjenu pozovite. An incredible opportunity I am selling a house in the heart of Tvrdje for a good investment ready for adoption (full renovation) You can take advantage of the incentive. It can also be exchanged with a surcharge and open to other combinations. I am asking for 75,000 euros or an approximate offer. If you have money and time for a good future. I am selling because I live abroad and am not returning to Croatia. It also has a work permit and other papers. If you are interested, call 098843997 or an investor partner. If you have a combination or swap, call.
